individual_reviews.review_text: I requested a quote for a leaking window and Daniel from Impact Roofing was incredible! He came by and spent the time and energy to fully diagnose the problem. This was amazing and made me feel confident in the solution he proposed and was a stark contrast to other companies who just suggested broad solutions without even testing anything. He also found causes to the issue that no one else found and suggested a cost efficient solution.

Impact Roofing, was one of the first companies to respond back to my Yelp Request, when many didn't. They came back with a Precise and through quote. And then they came out in one day after scheduling and did the repair.

Upon recommendation of my neighborhood, I reached out to Michael and Impact Roofing for assessment of my roof. Michael was responsive, walked me through what he found and next steps to work with my insurance company. A full replacement of roof, gutters etc. was approved by my insurer.

We hired impact roofing and renovations to build a sunroom porch off the back of our home. We met with Mason and Ben from the design team initially. Out of all the quotes we received, we appreciated their educational approach.

I put out a request for bids on an improvement/extension to my roof. This was the third time I'd done this. Impact Roofing was the only contractor who called back and explained to me why the request could create issues in the roof.

Impact Roofing came out to review my roof, but when I had follow up questions they did not respond. I emailed and called the technician and the office manager as was told they would get back to me but they never answered my questions.
This company helped me solve my issues with my roof and siding replacement. Thank you impact roofing!
Great job on my roof. One day service 8am to 8 pm. They brought a crew of 10+ people and were all in synch.

I requested a quote for a leaking window and Daniel from Impact Roofing was incredible! He came by and spent the time and energy to fully diagnose the problem. This was amazing and made me feel confident in the solution he proposed.
Impact Roofing, was one of the first companies to respond back to my Yelp Request... They came out in one day after scheduling and did the repair.
Michael and Impact Roofing for assessment of my roof. Matt has done a very good job of keeping me appraised throughout the process. ...The house looks great with the new roof, gutters etc.
We hired impact roofing and renovations to build a sunroom porch off the back of our home. ...The porch itself is more beautiful than we expected.
The Impact Roofing team is incredible. ...Since their work on our home, we have not had any further issues with leaks. We could not be happier.
individual_reviews.service_performed: Roof Replacement and Flat Roof Deck Repair

individual_reviews.review_text: I put out a request for bids on an improvement/extension to my roof. Impact Roofing was the only contractor who called back and explained to me why the request could create issues in the roof and advised me not to pursue it.
Impact Roofing came out to review my roof, but when I had follow up questions they did not respond...They could have just told me that rather than ignoring me.
Impact (specifically Mason) went above and beyond my expectations for a roofing company. ...Their pricing was competitive, and I believe I received the best value for my money.
This company helped me solve my issues with my roof and siding replacement. Thank you impact roofing!
Great job on my roof. One day service from 8am to 8 pm... They brought a crew of 10+ people and were all in synch.

business_info.name: Impact Roofing & Renovations

awards.name: Nextdoor Neighborhood Fave
awards.description: Voted as the favorite neighborhood business.

business_info.description: Locally owned roofing contractor with expertise in traditional shingle roofs, as well as TPO, metal, slate and cedar. We have a goal to help reduce the 10 million tons of shingles that end up in landfills every year by educating homeowners on natural products and on the importance of a quality installation.

customer_interaction.estimate_process: Free estimates are offered for roofing services including replacement consultations and repairs.
customer_interaction.onboarding_process: Responsive with detailed consultation on roof issues and solutions provided.
customer_interaction.communication_style: Highly responsive to customer inquiries and concerns.
